DOC.brief_summary: A pilot study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of leflunomide in SLE patients with active disease who are refractory to cyclophosphamide
DOC.criteria: Fulfill the revised ACR criteria for SLE with either evidence of active disease according to SLE Disease Activity Index (SLEDAI) Patients who are pregnant or nursing women, or those with life threatening disease The above information is not intended to contain all considerations relevant to a patient's potential participation in a clinical trial.
